attributes.action: place on statute a requirement to review any and all legislation which affects civil liberties every two years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the unelected Prime minister and his ministers are 'generating in the name of 'anti terrorist state security' a miriad of legislation clauses slipped into non relevant statues which infiringe on the majorities liberties to live a natural and private life without interference from the state - Legislation should be put in place to review/ remove these clauses to enusure they have not been used for anything other than their intended purpose and removed or ammended if they have been seen to be abused by either Local or Central government officials for 'state sponsered benefit' as opposed to "the benefit of the people" as intended
